extension.description: SD Live CCK Field Plugin - Easily use the value of any field within a CCK content type as your live value. Useful for pre-populating form modules with data from the content type in the main content area. NOTE: This will ONLY work when the form is shown alongside a SINGLE cck item and will NOT work when multiple CCK items are present, such as blog category layout. Enjoy!
